tossup_question: -   –  Testosterone and other androgens are produced by what specialized cells that populate the seminiferous tubules?
bonus_question: -   –  Which of the following is not a medically relevant difference between eukaryotic cells and bacterial cells?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Differences in ribosome structure
X) Presence of peptidoglycan layer in bacteria
Y) Differences in genetic code
Z) Presence of lipopolysaccharides [lye-poh-poly-sak-kar-ides] in bacteria
bonus_answer: ANSWER: Y) DIFFERENCES IN GENETIC CODE
